text.__SUMMARY__: Albizia suluensis (the Zulu albizia) is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is found only in South Africa. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Hilton-Taylor, C., Scott-Shaw, R. & Johnson, D. 1998. Albizia suluensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 18 July 2007.
